title: Mcp-Server-Kintone
description: MCP server for kintone to enable AI tools like Claude Desktop to interact with kintone data.
creator: macrat

username.description: Username for login (only required if token is not used).

password.description: Password for login (only required if token is not used).

token.description: App tokens for login (only required if username and password are not used).

apps.description: List of apps to access, including IDs and permissions.
